answers.answer: Hello!Spotting before your expected date of periods can be due to several causes. This spotting can be suggestive of implantation bleeding .This spotting occurs when the fetus attaches to the wall of the uterus. Take up urine pregnancy test if you do not get your periods in a couple of days. If the urine pregnancy test is negative there are several other possibilities like hormonal imbalances, abnormalities in the uterus and the reproductive tract like uterine polpys, endometriosis, polycystic ovarian syndrome, infection, cancer etc.Systemic conditions like thyroid disease and diabetes can also cause spotting and menstrual irregularities. To find out the cause of your bleeding it is necessary to have a doctor examine you. Hope it helps.Take care and regards!

question: i  had sex when i was ovulating on the 23rd  and had sex again on the 5th and started to bleed not much so i put a pad on it was hardly any blood on it so on the 6th and 7th i experienced very light spotting for jus a couple of hours and my period is not due till the 10th and i never spot before my period can any one tell me what this could be
title: Spotting
